data.name: GetEpisodesForSeasonCached
data.value:
<bierdopje> <response> <result> <episodeid>418319</episodeid> <tvdbid>428750</tvdbid> <title>No More Good Days</title> <episodelink>http://www.bierdopje.com/shows/flashforward/episode/S01E01</episodelink> <season>1</season> <episode>1</episode> <epnumber>1</epnumber> <wip>true</wip> <wippercentage>100</wippercentage> <wipuser>rickth64</wipuser> <score>9,71</score> <votes>7</votes> <airdate>24-09-2009</airdate> <formatted>S01E01</formatted> <is_special>false</is_special> <subsnl>true</subsnl> <subsen>true</subsen> <summary>Everyone on Earth blacks out for exactly two minutes and 17 seconds, during which they see snippets from their futures six months ahead. For FBI agent Mark Benford (Joseph Fiennes) and his partner, Demetri Noh (John Cho), the event occurs during a high-speed chase and they find themselves investigating the phenomenon. Meanwhile, Benford's wife, Olivia (Sonya Walger), a doctor, wakes up on the floor of the OR.</summary>
</result> <result> <episodeid>443182</episodeid> <tvdbid>1062201</tvdbid> <title>White to Play</title> <episodelink>http://www.bierdopje.com/shows/flashforward/episode/S01E02</episodelink> <season>1</season> <episode>2</episode> <epnumber>2</epnumber> <wip>true</wip> <wippercentage>100</wippercentage> <wipuser>rickth64</wipuser> <score>9,83</score> <votes>6</votes> <airdate>01-10-2009</airdate> <formatted>S01E02</formatted> <is_special>false</is_special> <subsnl>true</subsnl> <subsen>true</subsen> <summary>Mark and Demetri go to Utah to investigate a lead on a suspect who might have a connection to the global blackout. Olivia sees the man from her flashforward, while her daughter Charlie is having trouble dealing with hers.</summary>
</result> <result> <episodeid>443183</episodeid> <tvdbid>1062211</tvdbid> <title>137 Sekunden</title> <episodelink>http://www.bierdopje.com/shows/flashforward/episode/S01E03</episodelink> <season>1</season> <episode>3</episode> <epnumber>3</epnumber> <wip>true</wip> <wippercentage>100</wippercentage> <wipuser>rickth64</wipuser> <score>8,71</score> <votes>7</votes> <airdate>08-10-2009</airdate> <formatted>S01E03</formatted> <is_special>false</is_special> <subsnl>true</subsnl> <subsen>true</subsen> <summary>Mark and Janis arrive in Germany to discuss the past events regarding the blackouts. Demetri fears about his future. Meanwhile, Aaron tries to get Mark to help him with an appeal.</summary>
</result> <result> <episodeid>443184</episodeid> <tvdbid>1062221</tvdbid> <title>Black Swan</title> <episodelink>http://www.bierdopje.com/shows/flashforward/episode/S01E04</episodelink> <season>1</season> <episode>4</episode> <epnumber>4</epnumber> <wip>true</wip> <wippercentage>100</wippercentage> <wipuser>rickth64</wipuser> <score>10</score> <votes>2</votes> <airdate>15-10-2009</airdate> <formatted>S01E04</formatted> <is_special>false</is_special> <subsnl>true</subsnl> <subsen>true</subsen> <summary>Olivia struggles to accept Bryce's suggestion that a patient's flashforward holds the key to a correct diagnosis and treatment. Meanwhile, Demetri accuses Mark of waiting for the future he saw in his flashforward to come true without incident, while Mark feels Demetri is letting his fear of what he witnessed envelop his life; and Nicole returns to work as Mark and Olivia's daughter's baby-sitter, and discloses her shocking future vision â involving a murder.</summary>
</result> <result> <episodeid>443185</episodeid> <tvdbid>1062231</tvdbid> <title>Gimme Some Truth</title> <episodelink>http://www.bierdopje.com/shows/flashforward/episode/S01E05</episodelink> <season>1</season> <episode>5</episode> <epnumber>5</epnumber> <wip>true</wip> <wippercentage>0</wippercentage> <wipuser>rickth64</wipuser> <score>0</score> <votes>0</votes> <airdate>22-10-2009</airdate> <formatted>S01E05</formatted> <is_special>false</is_special> <subsnl>false</subsnl> <subsen>false</subsen> <summary>Mark finds himself on the defense while being questioned about the details of his flashforward during a Senate Intelligence Committee hearing, which will decide whether to continue funding Wedeck's team. Meanwhile, Janis wonders how her flashforward will affect her current romantic relationship, and Olivia receives an anonymous message relating to Mark's flashforward.</summary>
</result> <result> <episodeid>443186</episodeid> <tvdbid>1062241</tvdbid> <title>Scary Monsters And Super Creeps</title> <episodelink>http://www.bierdopje.com/shows/flashforward/episode/S01E06</episodelink> <season>1</season> <episode>6</episode> <epnumber>6</epnumber> <wip>false</wip> <wippercentage>0</wippercentage> <wipuser></wipuser> <score>0</score> <votes>0</votes> <airdate>29-10-2009</airdate> <formatted>S01E06</formatted> <is_special>false</is_special> <subsnl>false</subsnl> <subsen>false</subsen> <summary>Mark, Demetri and Wedeck try to connect Janis' attack with a separate attack made on them; Olivia confronts Mark about his flashforward; Demetri and Gough track down a clue from Mark's flash; Dylan goes missing from the hospital</summary>
</result> <result> <episodeid>443187</episodeid> <tvdbid>1062251</tvdbid> <title>The Gift</title> <episodelink>http://www.bierdopje.com/shows/flashforward/episode/S01E07</episodelink> <season>1</season> <episode>7</episode> <epnumber>7</epnumber> <wip>false</wip> <wippercentage>0</wippercentage> <wipuser></wipuser> <score>0</score> <votes>0</votes> <airdate>05-11-2009</airdate> <formatted>S01E07</formatted> <is_special>false</is_special> <subsnl>false</subsnl> <subsen>false</subsen> <summary>Mark, Demetri, Gough and MI6 agent Fiona Banks investigate a Blue Hand club and its possible connection to some recent suicides. Meanwhile, Aaron receives a surprise visit from a former army buddy of his late daughter's, Demetri comes clean with Zoey about his lack of a flashforward, and Nicole helps Bryce uncover the mystery of his flashforward while volunteering at the hospital.</summary>
</result> <result> <episodeid>443188</episodeid> <tvdbid>1062261</tvdbid> <title>Playing Cards With Coyote</title> <episodelink>http://www.bierdopje.com/shows/flashforward/episode/S01E08</episodelink> <season>1</season> <episode>8</episode> <epnumber>8</epnumber> <wip>false</wip> <wippercentage>0</wippercentage> <wipuser></wipuser> <score>10</score> <votes>1</votes> <airdate>12-11-2009</airdate> <formatted>S01E08</formatted> <is_special>false</is_special> <subsnl>false</subsnl> <subsen>false</subsen> <summary></summary>

data.name: SingleShowCached
data.value:
<bierdopje> <response> <showid>12934</showid> <tvdbid>84024</tvdbid> <showname>FlashForward</showname> <showlink>http://www.bierdopje.com/shows/flashforward</showlink> <firstaired>24 september 2009 00:00:00</firstaired> <lastaired>22 oktober 2009 00:00:00</lastaired> <nextepisode>12 november 2009 00:00:00</nextepisode> <seasons>1</seasons> <episodes>11</episodes> <genres> <result>Drama</result> <result>science-fiction</result>
</genres> <showstatus>Terugkomende serie</showstatus> <network></network> <airtime>8:00 PM</airtime> <runtime>45</runtime> <score>9,53</score> <favorites>796</favorites> <has_translators>false</has_translators> <summary>What if you saw your future 6 months from now? A glimpse of where you will be and who you will be with. Would you look forward to what was coming... or would you try to stop it? A mysterious global event causes everyone to black out simultaneously for two minutes and seventeen seconds, and each person sees a glimpse of their lives six months from now. When they wake up, everyone is left wondering if what they saw will actually happen.</summary> <status>true</status> <cached>true</cached> </response> </bierdopje>
